@graph.name: Mixed Vehicles Routing - Mixed Fleet Route Optimization - Route4Me
@graph.description: Optimize routes for mixed vehicle fleets with different capacities and parameters. Plan efficient routes for trucks, vans, and pickups based on carrying capacity, volume, weight, and other constraints.
@graph.keywords: mixed fleet routing, variable vehicle size planning, fleet optimization, truck route planning, commercial vehicle routing, vehicle capacity optimization, mixed vehicles, route planning software, logistics optimization, delivery fleet management, transportation efficiency, capacity constraints, vehicle parameters, route efficiency, vehicle profile management

@graph.name: Mixed Vehicles Routing for Fleet Optimization
@graph.description: With Route4Me's Mixed Fleet add-on, you can now optimize routes for a mixed variety of vehicles with that famous 'click of a button' feeling. Trucks, vans, pickups or other commercial vehicles all offer differing parameters such as carrying capacity, cubic volume, weight, height, length, weight per axle, etc. These differing vehicle types all have their advantages, but optimizing routes while taking their parameters into account can be an exhausting challenge. Now you can easily create vehicle profiles which account for the varying capacity constraints of your vehicles, including maximum pieces, cubic volume, weight, and revenue per vehicle. Your Mixed Fleet will be sure to take advantage of the capacity of each vehicle so you're not wasting time and money with extra vehicles.

@graph.name: Request Mixed Fleet Implementation
@graph.description: Contact our team to discuss implementing Mixed Vehicles Routing for your organization

@graph.name: Vehicle Capacity Options
@graph.value: Maximum pieces per vehicle, maximum cubic volume per vehicle, maximum weight per vehicle, maximum revenue per vehicle

@graph.name: Supported Vehicle Types
@graph.value: Trucks, vans, pickups, and other commercial vehicles with different parameters

@graph.name: Vehicle Parameters
@graph.value: Carrying capacity, cubic volume, weight, height, length, weight per axle

@graph.name: Key Benefits
@graph.value: Optimized vehicle usage, reduced fleet costs, improved route efficiency, simplified planning process
